idea-plugin.name: Agentlang
idea-plugin.description:
Agentlang support for IntelliJ-based IDEs.

  • Syntax highlighting with the bundled TextMate grammar
  • Language Server Protocol features (diagnostics, completion, navigation)

Requires a node executable on PATH to launch the language server.
idea-plugin.change-notes: • Initial release with TextMate highlighting and LSP integration.
